item.title: [HOW TO LET NPC DROPS!] (plz good tut)
item.dc:creator: @Darkness_Pk Darkness Pk
item.description:
@Darkness_Pk wrote:

[quote=“i0wnuall, post:5, topic:255719”][quote author=erwinho14 link=topic=337887.msg2623019#msg2623019 date=1231600569]

O mighty search button please help this stranger…

fuck u noob i did it but now one has good tut
[/quote]
Dude chill, but seriously use the search button.
There should be tons of good tuts on how to control Npc Drops.[/quote]Thanks, this kid is probably raised that everything is done for him…
Also look further than MoparScape…

Read full topic
